revision.text:
This is the default [[sound sequence]] for [[Ceiling_CrushAndRaiseSilentA]] and [[Ceiling_CrushRaiseAndStaySilA]] in [[ZDoom]]. Movement is silent, except for the stopping sound.
==== [[SNDSEQ]] definition ==== :CeilingSemiSilent stopsound plats/pt1_stop end [[Category:Sound sequences]]
